name: Eyefox puzzle
description:
This game is a python project where you have to reproduce the left's grid by modifying the right's grid.

How does it work?  Tap a square to swap its face and his neighbors' face.

Be careful, the difficulty is considerably growing up every 30 levels. This game will help your reflexion's skill. If you are a chess player, this will also be usefull to play many moves in advance.

This game is one of my "ICodeForFun" serie. If you see some bugs, are something to improve, pls let me know : ) !
